MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 postcode area of Duns. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore supplies to a number of properties in the area and our engineers are carrying out further investigation onsite to locate the cause of fault affecting customers without supply and we now expect your supply to be restored by 11.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.17pm on 4th December 2020.
